Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: The tavern's warmth envelops you, rich with the scent of spiced ale and stew. In the dim light, a woman speaks with the barkeep. Their easy familiarity hinting at a bond deeper than mere acquaintance.
Dialogues.text: The tavern's warmth envelops you, rich with the scent of spiced ale and stew. In the dim light, a woman speaks with the barkeep. Their easy familiarity hinting at a bond deeper than mere acquaintance.

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: You approach the woman and the barkeep, looking to learn more about this town. During the conversation with them ,the unknown woman revealing herself as the famed Captain Orphila Fay. 'Well,' she says, her eyes measuring you. 'What brings a naval officer to a small fishing town like this?'
Dialogues.text: You approach the woman and the barkeep, looking to learn more about this town. During the conversation with them ,the unknown woman revealing herself as the famed Captain Orphila Fay. 'Well,' she says, her eyes measuring you. 'What brings a naval officer to a small fishing town like this?

replies.buttonText: Looking for merc who will take up work.
replies.text: Looking for merc who will take up work.

replies.buttonText: We can talk about something else.
replies.text: You don't want to answer her question so you changed subjects.

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: You sidestep her question with pleasantries. Soon, her gaze drifts past you. 'A word another time, perhaps,' she says, turning back to her drink. The conversation is over.
Dialogues.text: You sidestep her question with pleasantries. Soon, her gaze drifts past you. 'A word another time, perhaps,' she says, turning back to her drink. The conversation is over.

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: You speak of recruitment. Her eyes sharpen with interest. 'I'll hear your terms,' she says, 'but know this - Orphila Fay serves no nameless patron, and my service never comes cheap.'
Dialogues.text: You speak of recruitment. Her eyes sharpen with interest. 'I'll hear your terms,' she says, 'but know this - Orphila Fay serves no nameless patron, and my service never comes cheap.

replies.text: You detailed her on the request without telling her any sensitive information.

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: 'A worthy task,' she nods. 'I'll take it. Give me until dawn to prepare. Signal when you sail—you'll find me ready at your ship.'
Dialogues.text: Check out the source of disturbance.

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: 'Details are settled,' she says, her hand extended. 'But I don't leave the dock on promises alone. The coin comes first.'(20000 coins)
Dialogues.text: Check out the source of disturbance.

replies.text: You detailed her on the request without telling her any sensitive information.

replies.buttonText: I still need to think about it.

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: 'Take your time. Let me know when you have the coins, I will be here.' she turn around to talk to the barkeeper once more.
Dialogues.text: Check out the source of disturbance.
